DOC.brief_summary: Recent clinical trial demonstrate virtual histology-intravascular ultrasound ( VH-IVUS ) useful test predict clinical outcome coronary artery disease ( CAD ) . Thin cap fibroatheroma ( VH-TCFA ) propose predictor cardiovascular event VH-IVUS combine 70 % plaque burden le 4mmÂ² minimal lumen area ( MLA ) IVUS . Fractional flow reserve ( FFR ) establish index physiological significance coronary stenosis . Recent large scale trial demonstrate FFR guide PCI show favorable clinical outcome . VH-IVUS represent anatomical severity , FFR represent functional severity CAD . Few study report relevance two test . Aim study investigate whether geometry composition lesion different FFR criterion .
DOC.brief_title: VH-IVUS Plaque Composition Analysis By Fractional Flow Reserve
